name: eGain Corporation
description: eGain Corporation is a leading provider of cloud-based customer engagement solutions for businesses worldwide. Founded in 1997, eGain has established itself as a pioneer in the field of customer service and engagement, offering a suite of products that enable organizations to deliver exceptional customer experiences across multiple channels, including web, mobile, social, and voice. The company’s flagship product, the eGain Engagement Platform, integrates AI-driven knowledge management, chat, and email solutions to empower customer service teams to resolve inquiries efficiently and effectively. eGain serves a diverse range of industries, including telecommunications, financial services, healthcare, and retail, helping companies improve customer satisfaction, reduce service costs, and drive sales. With a strong focus on innovation, eGain continues to invest in AI and analytics, enabling businesses to leverage data for better decision-making and enhanced customer interactions. The company is headquartered in Sunnyvale, California, and has a global presence, serving organizations in over 30 countries. eGain's mission is to transform the way companies engage with their customers, ensuring that every interaction is meaningful and productive.
